translations: [生化]凝集素（lectin 的复数）；[生化]外源凝集素

sentences.sentence: Rabbit red blood cells were most sensitive to lectins.
sentences.translation: 兔血红细胞对各类凝集素最敏感。

sentences.sentence: Plant lectins are widely distributed in plant kingdom.
sentences.translation: 植物凝集素广泛分布于植物界。

sentences.sentence: Plant lectins have been shown to be insecticidal to pests including Homopteran pests.
sentences.translation: 植物凝集素对包括同翅目在内的害虫具有有效抗性作用。
